idea:
I am Shreya Jaiswal from CodeTots living in Japan, Yokohama for 5 years. I have launched a start up in India last year and we are currently looking for an experienced mentor to support us at every step of our startup journey and help us with fund raising process. 


Codetots is an Edtech platform. We are envisioning the role of technology in transforming education. We are changing lives of students every month by equipping students with tools to be aware of the world around them and by creating innovative solutions in every lesson they learn through Coding.


At CodeTots we firmly believes, we parents have to make sure that future generations enjoy everything we enjoy today. 

We have launched CodeTots in India last year. CodeTots - Online Live Coding & Sustainability Development Coding Class for Kids Age 6 -14 Years old.


CodeTots Mission is #codeForBetterFuture #ican 

The I CAN Mindset equips every child to be

AWARE of the world around them

ENABLED with the skills to take action and

EMPOWERED to design a more desirable

and sustainable future - TODAY!  


Coding + Sustainability = Bright Future


Please Visit CodeTots at https://codetots.com for more information.
name: CodeTots

idea:
G.O.D. - Games On Demand is a unique pay per hour gaming platform/service where the users pay for however long they play.


Our advantages include seamless integration with various platforms, a diverse

game collection, relatively less internet bandwidth requirement, and more Value for Money !!
name: G.O.D. - Games On Demand

idea: Vaze Corporates is a corporate company planning to provide exemplary services in various sectors mainly construction and healthcare and much more. A company formed with a creative and idealistic vision of its founder with a motto to combine the youth with the experienced olds to achieve target. Thus providing a balanced environment to work in.
name: VAZE CORPORATES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
LivPrint Exo is a Mumbai based product design and 3D printing firm that manufactures custom-made orthosis, assistive mobility & immobilisation solutions.


Tailor-made for every client, LivPrint products provide bespoke fit and immobilisation. And with a range of rigid and tensile materials in our portfolio, our products are fully customisable and can be designed in conjunction with doctors, physiotherapists and sports therapy professionals, according to specific client needs.


LivPrint products are manufactured with certified 3D printing accuracy and accelerate the time taken for rehabilitation/healing/therapy. Catering to an array of orthopaedic, post-operative and sports-therapy requirements.


To speak with us, you can call on +91 99307 288 92

Or drop us an email at connect@livprintincorporated.com
name: LIVPRINT EXO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
AltiusTech Health is a healthcare IT company with profound expertise in the healthcare domain and singular focus on timely delivery of quality healthcare solutions and services across the globe. With its immense technology expertise and effective consulting, AltiusTech Health has been able to deliver continued value to its stakeholders by offering optimum solutions and premium quality service.

AltiusTech Health has an in-house team of motivated individuals committed to achieve excellence in empowering healthcare innovations with high-end and cost-effective workflow analysis, technical implementations, end user training, integrations, data migration and service support to the leading healthcare tech providers and hospitals across the globe.

AltiusTech Health is committed to providing cutting edge technical expertise to improve the quality of healthcare solutions. It has been implementing optimal and requirement specific solutions in many countries across Middle East and Africa.
name: ALTIUSTECH HEALTH IT SOLUTIONS LLP
